meanings.definition: To make something visually appealing or beautiful.
meanings.sent1: She aestheticizes her room by adding colorful paintings and soft lighting.
meanings.sent2: The artist aestheticizes the plain wall with a mural of vibrant flowers.
meanings.sent3: The cat aestheticizes its bed by arranging its toys neatly around it.
meanings.sent4: The sunset aestheticizes the sky with hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The garden aestheticizes the backyard with blooming flowers and lush greenery.

meanings.definition: To give a particular artistic or visual quality to something.
meanings.sent1: The designer aestheticizes the dress with intricate lace details.
meanings.sent2: The photographer aestheticizes the landscape by capturing the perfect lighting.
meanings.sent3: The chef aestheticizes the plate by arranging the food in an artistic manner.
meanings.sent4: The dancer aestheticizes the performance with graceful movements and expressive gestures.
meanings.sent5: The architect aestheticizes the building with sleek lines and modern materials.
